author: ehu
msg: ra_dav-refactoring: We're past 1.3 now; refer to issue 2263 for more info.

author: ehu
msg: ra_dav-refactoring: Add 'body' parameter to svn_ra_dav__request_dispatch as
the majority of callers attach one themselves now.
(svn_ra_dav__request_dispatch): Add a 'body' parameter and register it

author: ehu
msg: ra_dav-refactoring: Rename the Neon request to 'ne_req' in the request struct
as suggested by dlr (removing accesses whereever possible).

author: ehu
msg: ra_dav-refactoring: Unduplicate code by moving shared code deeper into
(svn_ra_dav__set_header): Convenience macro to set request headers
eliminate the need to call ne_add_request_header() in the callers,
some of which get their headers passed in as a hash.
Adjust callers to pass headers into svn_ra_dav__request_dispatch().

author: ehu
msg: ra_dav-refactoring: Add space between cast and function name.
